backend/main.mo: Actor implementation handling registrants, user profiles, badges, and access control with authorization checks and search/filter utilities.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old registrant records to new format by adding optional social and crypto fields.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature requirements to affected frontend files and component versions.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Deployment guide detailing steps, verification, environment handling, and troubleshooting for mainnet releases.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based stylesheet defining warm color tokens and light/dark theme variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React application via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring TanStack Router routes and global layout with theming and profile setup modal.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Main app layout with header, navigation, mobile menu handling, auth controls, and deployment mismatch warnings.
frontend/src/components/AuthControls.tsx: Provides sign-in/sign-out button logic using Internet Identity with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/components/DeploymentInfo.t: Popover component showing deployment diagnostics, canister mismatch alerts, and copyable deployment data.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal prompting new authenticated users to enter and save a display name.
frontend/src/components/world/PlanetWorl: Three.js scene rendering a rotating planet and animated inhabitants with auto-rotating camera controls.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Fetches current user's profile, role, and admin status using the actor and Internet Identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and auth client setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for CRUD operations on user profiles and registrants via the actor API, including list, search, add, delete, and count functions.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserBadge.ts: Defines a React Query hook to fetch or create the current user's badge using the actor API with caching and minimal retries.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind CSS layers and defines light/dark theme CSS variables for colors, layout, and UI styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it in QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/DirectoryPage.tsx: Implements a searchable and filterable community directory with skill filters, admin deletion, and loading/error states.
frontend/src/pages/EventsPage.tsx: Displays a teaser page for upcoming Web3-related features with informational cards and a completed-step indicator.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Renders the public landing page with hero content, calls to action, and feature highlights for joining the network.
frontend/src/pages/RegistrationPage.tsx: Provides a registration form allowing authenticated users to create or update a registrant profile with validation and badge loading.
frontend/src/pages/WorldPage.tsx: Renders the Digital World scene with authentication gating, registrant count fetching, error handling, and a 3D planet visualization.
frontend/src/utils/deploymentInfo.ts: Provides deployment environment detection, infers network/canister IDs from hostname, and reports mismatches for diagnostics.
frontend/src/utils/oisyWallet.ts: Empty placeholder file for Oisy wallet utilities.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session-stored values.
frontend/src/utils/worldPlacement.ts: Generates deterministic 3D positions and colors for inhabitants on a sphere using golden-angle distribution.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, color tokens, typography, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Metadata file describing project state, requirements, architecture notes, and known issues.
